messages.title: ELECTION COMMUNICATION
messages.content: Mid Derbyshire has been taken for granted for too long. I pledge to give YOU the voice that you deserve, and represent OUR interests as a community.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An NHS for everyone - not for profit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's plans to invest in our NHS, recruit the doctors and nurses we need, and bring services closer to your home.
We will plant 2 billion trees by 2040, invest in green industries to create jobs and tackle the climate crisis.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The right homes in the right places
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building homes in the right places, investing in council housing and controlling rents.

issues.environment: We will plant 2 billion trees by 2040, invest in green industries to create jobs and tackle the climate crisis.
issues.health: Labour's plans to invest in our NHS, recruit the doctors and nurses we need, and bring services closer to your home.

housing.content: Building homes in the right places, investing in council housing and controlling rents.

endorsements.endorsement: Emma is the missing heartbeat of our local politics which thriving to open the door to a honest voice and presence of the local community.
